scripts.start:env: if-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=UAT && npm run uat || if-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=SIT && npm run sit || if-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=LIVE && npm run start:prod || npm run start
scripts.sit: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm i --include=dev && npm run dev
scripts.uat: concurrently "npm run start" "npm run test:functional" "npm run test:e2e-wait"
scripts.uat:nowait: concurrently "npm run start" "npm run test:functional" "npm run test:e2e"
scripts.build: cd e2e && npm i && cd .. && next build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd e2e && npm i && cd .. && next build
scripts.test:performance: npm i -g lighthouse && cross-env-shell 'lighthouse --chrome-flags="--headless" $UAT_URL --output html --output-path public/lighthouse-report.html'
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e-test && npm run test:e2e-report
scripts.test:e2e-test: cd e2e && npx playwright install && npm run test
scripts.test:e2e-wait: cross-env-shell "npx wait-on $UAT_URL && npm run test:performance && npm run test:e2e"
